challenge_extreme.title: Extreme Challenges
challenge_extreme.description: Fiercer challenges for the brave ðŸ˜ˆ

imitation.imitation_001: Slow motion: run in place for 10 seconds like in an action movie.
imitation.imitation_002: Glitchy robot: speak for 10 seconds with cuts and jerky gestures.
imitation.imitation_003: Max stress: you search for your keys in panic, but stay polite.
imitation.imitation_004: Dreaming dog: sound effects + twitching paws (without getting up).
imitation.imitation_005: Very serious teacher: explain something ridiculous like it's a final exam.
imitation.imitation_006: Video game hero: you discover a secret passage.
imitation.imitation_007: Cat giving a speech: make a solemn speech... to demand kibble.
imitation.imitation_008: Scalding coffee: you stay calm but suffer inside.
imitation.imitation_009: Thinking hen: you ponder as if you're inventing science.
imitation.imitation_010: Sad ghost: cross the room in silent melodrama mode.
imitation.imitation_011: Fish out of water: panic + dramatic breathing (no screaming).
imitation.imitation_012: Overexcited kid: announce incredible news to everyone.
imitation.imitation_013: Superhero before battle: epic pose + epic line (one sentence only).
imitation.imitation_014: Explorer: you discover a treasure and act like it's normal.
imitation.imitation_015: Lego: walk in place and improvise a very polite insult.
imitation.imitation_016: Lost pirate: you look for your treasure map... and accuse someone.
imitation.imitation_017: TV presenter: announce a mundane event like breaking news.
imitation.imitation_018: Vampire: try to talk with teeth that are way too long.
imitation.imitation_019: Failed magician: your trick fails, but you act like it was on purpose.
imitation.imitation_020: Stifled sneeze: you struggle for 10 seconds, then fake victory.
imitation.imitation_021: Athlete: you celebrate... then realize you lost (slow motion).
imitation.imitation_022: Stealthy spy: you sneak around like you're being followed (eyes everywhere, silence).
imitation.imitation_023: Politician: answer a simple question while avoiding the answer (10 seconds).

challenge.challenge_002: Improbable yoga pose for 15 seconds (group rates creativity).
challenge.challenge_003: Tell a joke: goal = at least one smile.
challenge.challenge_004: Dramatic love declaration to an object chosen by the group. (15 seconds)
challenge.challenge_005: Spoon on your nose for 20 seconds (no hands).
challenge.challenge_006: 8 sloppy push-ups allowed (Lite: 5 or against the wall).
challenge.challenge_007: Statue for 20 seconds while the group tries to make you laugh.
challenge.challenge_008: Copy someone's posture for 10 seconds, down to the millimeter.
challenge.challenge_009: Held note: the group times you (max 20 seconds).
challenge.challenge_010: Alphabet backwards... from Z to P only. (Lite: Z to T)
challenge.challenge_011: Diction: repeat 3 times 'Les chaussettes seches de Serge' without messing up.
challenge.challenge_012: Memory: repeat 6 words chosen by the group. (Lite: 4)
challenge.challenge_013: Invisible juggling for 15 seconds... but very serious.
challenge.challenge_014: Bottle on your head for 15 seconds without falling (Lite: 10 seconds).
challenge.challenge_015: Non-dominant hand: sign your first name as neatly as possible.
challenge.challenge_016: No-laugh: eye contact for 15 seconds without smiling (Lite: 10 seconds).
challenge.challenge_017: Answer a group question in exactly 7 words. (Lite: 5)
challenge.challenge_018: Speed: answer 3 group questions in 10 seconds without hesitating (Lite: 2 questions).
challenge.challenge_019: Flash memory: remember 5 digits said by the group and repeat them. (Lite: 3 digits)
challenge.challenge_020: Category challenge: name 6 animals in 10 seconds (Lite: 4 in 10 seconds).
challenge.challenge_021: Alphabet challenge: say a sentence where every word starts with the same letter (letter chosen). (Lite: 3 words)
challenge.challenge_022: Trick question challenge: answer a group question starting with 'Obviously...' then improvise (10 seconds).
challenge.challenge_023: Ranking challenge: the group gives you 3 things, you must rank them from most useful to least useful in 5 seconds. (Lite: 8 seconds)
challenge.challenge_024: Quick duel challenge: pick someone, play rock-paper-scissors. Loser makes a very serious bow.

fun.fun_001: Animal: which would you be? Why? (15 seconds).
fun.fun_002: Your hidden talent... but you have to sell it like an ad. (20 seconds)
fun.fun_003: Your last big laugh, tell it in 20 seconds.
fun.fun_004: Superpower: which one? And what would your ridiculous flaw be?
fun.fun_005: Daily food: which one? Forbidden to say 'pizza'.
fun.fun_006: Your worst impulse buy, explain it in 15 seconds.
fun.fun_007: Movie character: which one resembles you? Why?
fun.fun_010: Weirdest thing you ate: rate it out of 10.
fun.fun_011: Best made-up excuse: act it out like in court.
fun.fun_012: Dessert: which would you be? Why? (15 seconds).
fun.fun_013: Dinner with a celebrity: who? And what do you talk about? (1 topic)
fun.fun_014: Something funny from school: short version, punchline required.
fun.fun_015: Guilty song: hum the chorus for 2 seconds.
fun.fun_016: Something heard on public transport: tell it like a news report.
fun.fun_018: Best animal imitation: 5 seconds on the clock.
fun.fun_019: Invent a new sport in 10 seconds: name + rule.
fun.fun_021: Your 'useless but useful' talent: give a concrete example.
fun.fun_022: If your phone could talk: what polite complaint would it make about you?
fun.fun_023: If you were an app: what do you do + your funniest bug.

wtf.wtf_001: Weird noise: do it without thinking. 2 seconds. Stop.
wtf.wtf_002: Alien language: talk for 10 seconds, then translate into English very seriously.
wtf.wtf_003: Give your left hand a name, then introduce it to the group.
wtf.wtf_004: Introduce yourself like a movie villain: 1 sentence + 1 evil laugh.
wtf.wtf_005: Describe a salad like an epic drama... in a whisper.
wtf.wtf_006: Invisible fight: battle a ghost, but in slow motion.
wtf.wtf_007: Alphabet: recite A to Z as fast as possible, replacing vowels with 'banana' without messing up.
wtf.wtf_008: IRL bug: freeze 3 times in a row like an NPC.
wtf.wtf_009: Your day seen by an alien: 2 sentences max.
wtf.wtf_010: Horror scream... silent version (mime a scream).
wtf.wtf_011: Relic object: pick an object and bless it like a priest.
wtf.wtf_013: Serious conversation with a plant: it judges you.
wtf.wtf_014: Sock theory: why do they always disappear? 1 argument.
wtf.wtf_015: Slogan: invent a brand and a slogan for a mundane object.
wtf.wtf_016: Emotion weather: announce 3 emotions like a weather report.
wtf.wtf_017: Why stairs are cat traps: prove it with 1 argument.
wtf.wtf_018: Serious ad for air: 1 slogan + 1 gesture.
wtf.wtf_019: Disastrous tutorial: explain 'how to open a door' but fail everything.
wtf.wtf_020: Breaking news: announce a tiny event as if it were historic.
wtf.wtf_021: Quick trial: accuse an object and deliver the verdict in 10 seconds.

wtf_plus.wtf_plus_001: Summoning ritual: the group chooses the entity (pigeon/fridge/potato). 20 seconds.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_002: Conspiracy theory: socks. Give 2 'proofs' + a conclusion.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_003: Serious speech on a ridiculous topic imposed by the group (15 seconds).
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_004: Absurd story: use 3 objects in the room (named by the group).
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_005: Love declaration to an object: the group chooses the object + the emotion.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_006: Horror movie: mime a scene, the group does the sound effects.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_007: Robot discovers emotions: you discover 3, one is invented.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_008: TV ad for an absurd product: the group chooses the product, you do the spot.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_009: Weird yoga: pose + name of the pose (like 'Chaos Croissant').
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_010: Imaginary door: greet the king of potatoes and ask for a favor.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_011: Serious conversation with your foot: your foot gives you a mission.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_012: President of the fridge: promise 3 laws. The group votes 'elected/not elected'.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_013: Recipe that saves or destroys humanity: 3 ingredients + final effect.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_014: Prophecy: 3 words given by the group, 20 seconds of prophecy.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_015: Illegal salesman: sell an object like it's forbidden because it's so powerful.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_016: Polite insult in secret language: then translate word for word.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_017: Trailer: 'The Revenge of the Socks' in 15 seconds, ultra serious.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_018: Interview: you are an object, the group asks 2 questions, you answer without breaking character.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_019: Documentary: describe a human (you) like a wild species (20 seconds).
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_020: Absurd debate: defend 'chairs rule the world' with 1 unbeatable argument.
wtf_plus.wtf_plus_021: Mirror portal: explain what's behind it... but you must lie convincingly.

mini_game.mini_game_001: 1v1 Rock-Paper-Scissors with the person to your right.
mini_game.mini_game_002: Blinking: first to blink loses (max 15 seconds).
mini_game.mini_game_003: Smile: first to smile loses (max 15 seconds).
mini_game.mini_game_004: Guess the animal: the person you choose thinks of an animal, 3 yes/no questions. You must guess.
mini_game.mini_game_005: Letter hunt: find a visible object starting with the letter chosen by the group.
mini_game.mini_game_006: Seat swap: switch places with someone (no talking).
mini_game.mini_game_007: Stare: stare at someone for 10 seconds, if anyone laughs = lose.
mini_game.mini_game_008: Movie in 5 words: make people guess a movie (no proper names).
mini_game.mini_game_010: Last to say 'cat' loses (penalty: statue 5 seconds).
mini_game.mini_game_011: Round object: first to point at a visible round object wins.
mini_game.mini_game_012: Flash drawing: draw someone in the group in 10 seconds (group guesses).
mini_game.mini_game_013: 3 anecdotes: one is false, the group votes which.
mini_game.mini_game_014: 5-letter word: first to say a 5-letter word (no proper noun) wins.
mini_game.mini_game_015: Forced sentence: make a sentence with 3 words given by the group without hesitating.
mini_game.mini_game_016: Blue object: first to point at a visible blue object wins.
mini_game.mini_game_017: Letter: in 10 seconds, say 3 words that start with the letter given by the group.
mini_game.mini_game_018: Theme: the group chooses a theme (e.g., fruits), you must name 5 items in 10 seconds.
mini_game.mini_game_019: Mini-quiz: tell a lie about yourself, the group votes true/false.

challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_001: Twisted alphabet: say the alphabet skipping every other letter for 10 seconds (no mistakes).
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_002: Perfect sentence: answer a group question in exactly 8 words. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_003: No 'uh': tell a mini-story in 12 seconds without saying 'uh', 'well', or 'like'. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_004: Forbidden letter: tell something about yourself in 15 seconds without using the letter 'A'. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_005: Controlled truth: say something true about yourself in 7 words max. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_006: Eye contact + silence: stare at someone for 10 seconds, then keep 5 seconds of total silence. Don't laugh.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_007: Compliment + pause: give a very specific compliment (not about appearance), then 5 seconds of silence while looking at them.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_008: Memory under sabotage: remember 10 words. The group asks 5 questions. You must recite the 10 words in order. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_009: Thanks only: for 15 seconds, respond to everything only with 'thanks'. Stay serious.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_010: Extreme breath: hold a sung note as long as possible while the group times you.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_011: Memorize a 12-word sentence invented by the group and repeat it without error.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_012: Minute memory: the group gives you 5 words + 5 digits. Repeat the words first, then the digits. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_013: Count from 1 to 50 replacing all multiples of 5 with 'pizza'.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_014: Trapped counting: count from 1 to 20, multiples of 3 = 'tac', multiples of 5 = 'boom' (one try).
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_015: Taking notes: for 15 seconds, respond to everything only with 'I'm taking note'. Stay serious.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_016: Fixed gaze in a group: look at 3 people in sequence for 3 seconds each as if judging them. Total silence.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_017: Absolutely + stare: for 15 seconds, respond only 'absolutely' while looking at the same person.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_018: Synonyms express: give 5 synonyms of a word chosen by the group in 10 seconds. (Lite: 3)
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_019: No 'I': tell a mini-event in 12 seconds without using 'I'. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_020: Yes-man: for 20 seconds, you must answer only 'absolutely' to everything said to you.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_021: No-man: for 20 seconds, you must answer only 'not at all' to everything said to you.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_022: Flash memory: the group says 9 words. You repeat them in order. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_023: Express definition: invent a word and define it in 10 seconds. The group rates creativity.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_024: Reverse memory: the group says 7 words. You repeat them backwards. One try.
challenge_extreme.challenge_extreme_025: Reversed numbers: the group says 6 digits. You repeat them backwards. One try.
